formatted_address: 271 Bukit Timah Rd, Balmoral Plaza, Singapore 259708
name: The Red Lion Public House

reviews.text: You know what? Pretty good. Seems they just expanded and updated this spot so it's more cosy for patrons to enjoy a pint and some fish & chips. I liked the battered fish but the fries were wimpy and cold. And the salt shaker was wet so no salt. A wee bit sad, that was. Yet the service is friendly and fast and the atmosphere congenial and relaxing, so I will definitely return.
Nice little pub with ice cold beer and they bring you fish n chips from the chippy next door.
Great pub, food excellent highly recommended. Staff all very nice and nice relaxed setting

All round good with a personality of it's own. Owners and staff are friendly and engaging. Only negative is that they ran out of draft beer at their inaugural quiz!!!! And then tried to charge $11 a bottle instead of $12 a pint. Owner sorted but had to rant a bit beforehand for it to get resolved. This place should last. It has been well done and thought through

Great food, great beers selection, great atmosphere! You can also order from Smith's Fish and Chip shop and eat at the pub, while watching the sport on one of the large screen TV's. Child friendly during the day. Both indoor and outdoor seating is available.
